metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1115 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A heap-buffer-overflow flaw was found in ImageMagickâ€™s PushShortPixel() function of quantum-private.h file. This vulnerability is triggered when an attacker passes a specially crafted TIFF image file to ImageMagick for conversion, potentially leading to a denial of service.

notes.Note: eslerm> introduced with ImageMagick 6's f90a091 on Jul 26 2021

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
